contentrichtext.text: {{About|the SI prefix||Tera (disambiguation){{!}}Tera}} {{wiktionary|tera-}} '''Tera''' is a unit [[SI prefix|prefix]] in the [[metric system]] denoting multiplication by 10<sup>12</sup> or {{gaps|1|000|000|000|000}}. It has the symbol '''T'''. ''Tera'' is derived from Ancient Greek τέρας (teras), meaning “monster”. The prefix tera was confirmed for use in the SI in 1960. {{SI prefixes}} ==See also== *[[SI prefix]] *[[Binary prefix]] ==References== {{reflist}} [[Category:SI prefixes]] [[he:תחיליות במערכת היחידות הבינלאומית#טרה]]
